abstract: It’s safe to say that Sullivan and Cromwell’s chairman, H. Rodgin Cohen, is one of the top counselors to banks, certainly when it comes to dealing with Washington. During a 30-day stretch last fall, Mr. Cohen advised Fannie Mae, the American International Group, Lehman Brothers, Barclays and JPMorgan Chase on their various government-brokered purchases and capital-raising efforts.
lead_paragraph: It’s safe to say that Sullivan and Cromwell’s chairman, H. Rodgin Cohen, is one of the top counselors to banks, certainly when it comes to dealing with Washington. During a 30-day stretch last fall, Mr. Cohen advised Fannie Mae, the American International Group, Lehman Brothers, Barclays and JPMorgan Chase on their various government-brokered purchases and capital-raising efforts.

headline.main: Sullivan’s Cohen on the State of Banking
